mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_INQUIRY (group_cd, inquiry_cd, parent_cd, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, rocket_cd) VALUES (#{group_cd}, #{inquiry_cd}, #{parent_cd}, #{inquiry_title}, #{inquiry_content}, #{rocket_cd})

insert.foreach: INTO T_INQUIRY_IMG(inquiry_img_cd, imageFileName, inquiry_cd, registor_date) VALUES(#{item.inquiry_img_cd}, #{item.imageFileName}, #{item.inquiry_cd}, sysdate)

mapper.select: SELECT ti.INQUIRY_CD , ti.PARENT_CD , ti.GROUP_CD , ti.INQUIRY_TITLE , ti.INQUIRY_CONTENT , ti.ROCKET_CD , ti.WRITE_DATE , tri.ID FROM T_INQUIRY ti JOIN T_ROCKET_INFO tri ON ti.ROCKET_CD = tri.ROCKET_CD WHERE inquiry_cd = #{inquiry_cd}
SELECT * FROM T_INQUIRY_IMG WHERE inquiry_cd = #{inquiry_cd} ORDER BY registor_date

insert.foreach: INTO T_INQUIRY_IMG(inquiry_img_cd, imageFileName, inquiry_cd, registor_date) VALUES(#{item.inquiry_img_cd}, #{item.imageFileName}, #{item.inquiry_cd}, sysdate)

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_INQUIRY WHERE inquiry_cd IN ( SELECT inquiry_cd FROM T_INQUIRY START WITH inquiry_cd = #{inquiry_cd} CONNECT BY PRIOR inquiry_cd = parent_cd )
